data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: You get an error message saying "Uknown Emoji"
data.expected_result: It should return the message "Maximum number of reactions reached (20)" if external emojis are enabled.
data.short_description: Discord returns wrong error message when reacting with an external emoji to a message that has reached the reaction limit
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message that has the maximum number of emoji reactions (20) and make sure that the server you are in allows external emojis. - React to it with an external emoji.
